    • Constructor Detail

      • OutgoingUDPClientPacket

        public OutgoingUDPClientPacket(UDPConnector connector,
                       java.net.DatagramPacket data,
                       OutgoingUDPClientPacket previousPacket)
        Constructs a new outgoing packet for an existing UDP Connector. Use this class to send data from the UDP Connector to a server. This is an outgoing message that will remain in the clients thread pool as a job for the thread pool workers.
        Parameters:
        UDPConnector - is the UDPConnector where this message belongs to.
        data - is the outgoing DatagramPacket.
        previousPacket - is the previous outgoing packet of the UDPConnector.

    • Method Detail

      • Cancel

        public void Cancel()
        Cancel this outgoing packet. By calling this method this and all the previous outgoing packets that are stored in the thread pool will be canceled. Call this method for the last outgoing packet of the UDPConnector when the UDPConnector disconnects.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getData

        public java.net.DatagramPacket getData()
        Returns the DatagramPacket of this outgoing UDP packet.
        Returns:
        the DatagramPacket of this outgoing UDP packet.

      • getPreviusPacket

        public OutgoingUDPClientPacket getPreviusPacket()
        Returns the previus outgoing packet of the client. If the packet is null means that the packet has been send to server.
        Returns:
        the previus outgoing packet of the client.
